summary: This mod makes twohanded weapons do more damage.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS]This mod makes twohanded weapons do more damage when perkpoints are invested in the barbarian perk so you will not  
have onehanders dealing a lot more damage than twohanders unless you upgrade a one hander, every time i find a really  
cool 2hander and i start using it in combat the damage differences always make me switch to a 1hander, its like we are not to use these weapons
even npcs hate the damn things!
 
I know there is one on here already but that one did nothing for me but overwrite existing records which changed  
nothing.

There is also a ordinator perks of skyrim patch, this is safe to merge with anything just make sure its under ordinator if your going to use the patch.  
You don’t need the main file if your going to use the ordinator patch.

Also this is for the people who have a "Hard core" setup
meaning a really hard to play skyrim like me, but if you just want a small damage boost from the perks there’s a x2 version, also if npcs have the perks they will get the increased damage.
Tell me if i did something wrong ^-^

May fame and Fortune be in your favor.

[/font]
author: Delano1613

files.name: 2handers do x3 More Damage Ordinator Patch
